articles.title: Trump says he will send troops to Portland, Oregon, in latest deployment to US cities
articles.description:

articles.title: New York City Mayor Eric Adams abandons his reelection campaign
articles.description:
Adams did not endorse any of the remaining candidates in the race, but he warned of “insidious forces” using local government to “advance divisive agendas.”
